title: conferred on me by section 42 of the Public Service Pay and Pensions Act
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Public Service Pay and Pensions
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Public Service Pay and Pensions 
Act 2017 (Payments to Community Pharmacy Contractors) (Amendment) 
Regulations 2021.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited public service pay pension act 2017 (payments community pharmacy contractors) (amendment) regulation 2021

title: conferred on me by section 42 of the Public Service Pay and Pensions Act
heading: 2. The Public Service Pay and Pensions Act 2017 (Payments to
text_raw:
2. The Public Service Pay and Pensions Act 2017 (Payments to 
Community Pharmacy Contractors) Regulations 2019 (S.I. No. 639 of 2019) 
are amended - 

(a) 

in Regulation 3, by the substitution of “the Health (Amendment) 
Act 1996 Scheme, the High Tech Medicinal Products Scheme 
and the National Influenza Immunisation Programme” for “the 
Health (Amendment) Act 1996 Scheme and the High Tech 
Medicinal Products Scheme”, 

(b) 

in Regulation 4, by the substitution of “Subject to Regulation 5, 
the payments” for “The payments”, 

(c) 

by the insertion of the following Regulation after Regulation 4: 

“5. 
The payments that shall be made to a community 
pharmacy contractor in respect of the services rendered by the 
community pharmacy contractor to or on behalf of the Health 
Service Executive under the National Influenza Immunisation 
Programme referred to in Regulation 3 on and from the day on 
which the Public Service Pay and Pensions Act 2017 (Payments 
(Amendment) 
to Community 
Regulations 2021 (S.I. No. 51 of 2021) come into operation 
shall be those specified in Schedule 6.”, and 

Pharmacy Contractors) 

(d) by the insertion of the following Schedule after Schedule 5: 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 26th February, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 “SCHEDULE 6 

[51] 3 

Amounts payable under the National Influenza Immunisation 

Reference 

Number 

(1) 

Programme 

Description 

Amount 

(2) 

(3)

title: conferred on me by section 42 of the Public Service Pay and Pensions Act
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation) 

These Regulations shall apply to payments in respect of services rendered by a 
Community Pharmacist to or on behalf of the Health Service Executive under 
and in accordance with the terms of the National Immunisation Programme. 

 
 
 
 
 
 [51] 7
